name: part_000
file: tmp_【お誕生日】BirthdayLive2021【＃ときのそら誕生日2021】 [lXdX1S1-Mxc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening graphic for Tokino Sora's Birthday Live 2021 featuring special guests AZKi, Hoshimachi Suisei, and others.
Tokino Sora performs 'Wonderland' live on stage, greeting her audience during the performance.

subtitles.original: Birthday Live 2021
subtitles.english: Birthday Live 2021

subtitles.original: キセキ色のような毎日を
subtitles.english: Every day is like a miracle,

subtitles.original: 君と過ごしたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to spend them with you.

subtitles.original: みんな！今日はときのそら誕生日2021に見に来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thank you for coming to see Tokino Sora's Birthday Live 2021 today!

subtitles.original:
wonderland
作詞・作曲：渡辺 翔
subtitles.english:
wonderland
Lyrics/Composition: Sho Watanabe

subtitles.original: 一緒にいれば wonderland
subtitles.english: When we're together, it's a wonderland.

subtitles.original: 楽しんでいってねー！
subtitles.english: Please enjoy the show!

subtitles.original: 憧れてた夢に乗せて
subtitles.english: Riding on the dreams I've longed for,

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔に会いに行きたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to go see your smile.

subtitles.original: 大好きな気持ちだけ
subtitles.english: Only these feelings of love,

subtitles.original: 変わらずに抱きしめて
subtitles.english: I'll keep holding onto them forever.

subtitles.original: 魔法のようなきらめき
subtitles.english: This magical sparkle,

subtitles.original: ずっと感じていたいな
subtitles.english: I want to feel it forever.

subtitles.original: みんな、たくさんのコメント見えてるよ！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone, I can see all your comments! Thank you!

subtitles.original: 今 奏でる奇跡のロマンティック
subtitles.english: The miracle romantic playing now,

subtitles.original: 希望を見せて 明日へ駆け抜けて
subtitles.english: Show me hope and run through to tomorrow.

subtitles.original: So dreamy 集めてイルミネーション
subtitles.english: So dreamy, gathering the illumination,

subtitles.original: 輝く夢のドア
subtitles.english: The door to shining dreams.

subtitles.original: 明日はもっと世界は輝くよ
subtitles.english: Tomorrow, the world will shine even more.

subtitles.original: 君次第さ wonderland
subtitles.english: It's up to you, wonderland.

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi!
